description: Yasuda was a teacher at the Tokyo Metropolitan Mitogawa High School until his recent retirement. Because he was against the censorship of books that was ongoing during the war and in the post-war period he decided to hide them in a secret room next to the school library. It is the same room that http://anidb.net/ch145181 [Chuuzenji Akihiko] uses now.
name: Yasuda-sensei
